verbs.description: upknit (third-person singular simple present upknits, present participle upknitting, simple past and past participle upknitted)

entries.meaning: (transitive, archaic) To knit together; to unite.
examples: Commerce, the cardinal condition and prerogative of peace, would work on with its myriads of interweaving shuttles, overwebbing and upknitting the divisions, meshing the sinews, and quenching the animus of war  [â€¦]
